name: State of Flow (Cubermanny, Smunro_Scotland, MarinZZZ, Bowey101)
name_original: State of Flow (Cubermanny, Smunro_Scotland, MarinZZZ, Bowey101)
description: Bruce Lee got sick of kicking ass, and moved to Brooklyn to become a Sewage Tycoon an ay! its a thoistey business. He Now waits, a drink that will never come. Fugetaboutit! Using the internal vending machine temperature controls, try to steer the drink to his waiting lips. Its like Bruce said, be like water, you put water in a vending machine, it becomes the vending machine...wait did Bruce say that? DON WORRY ABOU' IT! You will not succeed are you ready???
